name: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000
description: Jeremy McGrath Supercross 2000 is a supercross racing game for the Nintendo 64, Dreamcast, PlayStation and Game Boy Color. It was released in North America and Europe in 2000. The game is endorsed by supercross star Jeremy McGrath. Note that this game is not the same as the game Supercross 2000, which was released in 1999 by EA Sports.
